name: Ejected!
description:
Imagine

You are an astronaut who has been ejected/kicked out/escaped from/blown away or whatever reason are// from your space station. So now what? You are in a open space without any means of movement control and your oxygen supply runs down!

But, gladly, you are not the first who has been ejected and there’s alot remnants of previous misfits - oxygen tanks, fire extinguishers, even weapons. Catch them and throw away, speed or slow yourself up!

You have to delay the inevitable and try to survive through harsh space with various obstacles and enemies.

Controls

ESC - Pause

Inventory:

  • LMB - Select item
  • LMB drag - Reorder items
  • R while dragging - Rotate item

With item selected:

  • RMB - Cancel selection
  • Mouse - Controls direction in which you will throw or fire item
  • Q - Throw
  • LMB - Fire
  • E - Use item on self
  • R - Reload (flare gun)
Credits
  • Spaint - Code, animations
  • Vrex - Code, design
  • Kro - Music
  • AmaiDonatsu - Art, UI
Thanks to all the people who helped with their assets!
  • Astronaut model - Unreal Marketplace
  • Derelict assets - Unreal Marketplace
  • Angler model - Sketchfab
  • Squid model - Sketchfab
  • UAZ model - Sketchfab
  • Misc sounds - Zapsplat.com

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50.
